sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 A model of Titanic ship is made to a scale of 1 : 150.\\
 (i) If the length of the model is 6, find the length of the Titanic ship.\\
 (ii) The area of the deck of the actual ship was \(202500m^2\). Find the area of the deck of the model.\\
 (iii) If the volume of the model is \(9.3 m^3\), find the volume of the ship.\\
", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{(i) Since,the model of the ship is made to scale 1 : 150,\\}$$
 $$k(Scale factor) = 150\\$$
 \begin{align*}
 \text{Length of the ship} = k \times \text{length of the deck}\\
 = 150 \times 6 = 900 m
 \end{align*}
 $$\text{(ii)}$$
 \begin{align*}
 \text{Area of the ship} &= k^2 \times \text{Area of the deck}\\
 202500 = 150 \times 150 \times \text{Area of the deck}\\
 \text{Area of the deck} = 9 m^2
 \end{align*} 
 $$\text{(iii)}$$ 
 \begin{align*}
 \text{Volume of the ship} = k^3 \times \text{Volume of the deck}\\
 \text{Volume of the ship} = 150 \times 150 \times 150 \times 9.3\\
 \text{Volume of the deck} = 31387500.0 m^3
 \end{align*} 
 
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}]
